name: RecordPattern
description: The RecordPattern class describes where in the content of the RecordItem relevant information can be found.  It provides a way to reference subsets of information, identified by a pattern, in a large log file, audit trail, or forensic data.

type.name: type
type.description: Describes the type of pattern being specified in the element content.  The default is "regex".

ext-type.name: ext-type
ext-type.description: A means by which to extend the type attribute. See Section 5.1.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Amount of units (determined by the offsetunit attribute) to seek into the RecordItem data before matching the pattern.

offsetunit.name: offsetunit
offsetunit.description: Describes the units of the offset attribute. The default is "line".

ext-offsetunit.name: ext-offsetunit
ext-offsetunit.description: A means by which to extend the offsetunit attribute.  See Section 5.1.

instance.name: instance
instance.description: Number of types to apply the specified pattern.
